_header: At Alexander tell I you can / In Emperors time Zenon
Title(s): South English Legendary ; De sancta Theodora
_description: De sancta Theodora, in one MS of the South English Legendary — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
At Alisaundre tel i ow conIn þe Emperours tyme
                    Zenon…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God graunte vs grace wel to doAnd ȝiue us heuene blisse
                    also. AMEN
